Edubuntu 14.04, codenamed "the Trusty Tahr" (or "trusty") has been released on 17 April 2014 and will be supported along with point release updates until 2019.

The release announcement is available on the <nowiki>[[http://edubuntu.org/news/14.04-release|Edubuntu website]]</nowiki>.

== Obtaining Edubuntu 14.04 ==

=== Download a Disk Image ===
* Please refer to the <nowiki>[[http://www.edubuntu.org/download|Edubuntu Download page]]</nowiki> for download instructions.

Instructions for burning the image to a DVD or USB flash drive can be found on the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BurningIsoHowto|Burning ISO Howto]]</nowiki>.

We recommend that you <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.org/HowToMD5SUM|check your image file]]</nowiki> to ensure that the download concluded properly. Compare your MD5 checksum with the correct ones found <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/edubuntu/releases/trusty/ |alongside the images]]</nowiki>.

== Feedback ==

Before reporting bugs, please ensure your system is up to date. Instructions on how to file bugs are available on the <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/ReportingBugs|Ubuntu wiki.]]</nowiki>
